title: News24.com | EXPLAINED | Midnight confusion: this is when the coronavirus lockdown officially begins
description: Confusion around when the coronavirus lockdown officially kicks off was rife as South Africans grappled with the semantics of President Cyril Ramaphosa's words.
content:
Confusion around when the coronavirus lockdown officially kicks off was rife as South Africans grappled with the semantics of President Cyril Ramaphosa's words: "...midnight on Thursday".
